text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Do you know? That it took countless coincidences for Earth to reach the environment it has now.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: The distance to the sun, Earth’s mass, its size, the blessing of water from minor-planet collisions, and then―― Well, okay, that’s enough preamble.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: In short, the evolution of every event requires contingency as essential.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: ――Which means, right now! You, standing here by chance! Are going to be the subject of the next experiment!
